vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting an amendment to Specific Use Permit No. 1912 for a late hours establishment on property zoned Planned Development District No. 842, the Lower Greenville Avenue Special Provision District, with Specific Use Permit No. 1289 and Specific Use Permit No. 1912, on the west line of Greenville Avenue, south of Sears Street
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval for a five-year period, subject to amended conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval for a five-year period, subject to amended conditions
Z245-187(MB)
